channel.title: Need help running a client on linux
channel.description:
i'm trying to start my client on Ubuntu and i get this error i followed like 20 tuts
[code]Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit. Press Return key to continue: [/code]
Thanks :)
